items.text: PANTHEON integration at no extra cost

items.question: How long does onboarding take?
items.answer: From first consultation to full operation — about 12 days. Training takes 1 day.

items.question: Do drivers need smartphones?
items.answer: Yes, any Android or iPhone with Telegram or Viber. Most drivers already have a phone.

items.question: What if we're not on PANTHEON?
items.answer: Lako works standalone too. PANTHEON integration is an option, not a requirement.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: From €99/month for 5 vehicles. Contact us for a quote tailored to your fleet.

items.question: Can I try before buying?
items.answer: Yes — we offer a 30-day trial with no obligations.

items.question: What happens to my existing data?
items.answer: We migrate your data from PANTHEON automatically. Paper documentation is digitized during onboarding.

bots.title: Two bots — one system
bots.subtitle: Lako uses two Telegram bots that work together: one for your clients, one for you as the business owner.

catalog.title: Lako Catalog
catalog.description: Your clients use this bot to find your business, browse services, book appointments, and get automatic reminders. You don't have to do anything — the bot works for you.

admin.title: Lako Admin
admin.description: You use this bot to see all booked appointments, manage your schedule, view your client base, and send promotions. Your control center.

items.question: Do I need both bots?
items.answer: Yes, but you only use Lako Admin. Your clients use Lako Catalog to search and book appointments.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Registration and basic usage are free. For advanced features (detailed analytics, integrations, priority support) pricing starts from €100/month.

items.question: How long does it take to get started?
items.answer: Your business is in the catalog within 24 hours of registration.

items.question: Can clients book without Telegram?
items.answer: Currently, booking is only available through Telegram. We're working on Viber support.

items.question: Is my client data safe?
items.answer: Yes, we are fully GDPR-compliant. Your data is protected and never shared with third parties.

items.question: What if I need a custom feature?
items.answer: Contact us — we build custom solutions for your specific business needs.

items.question: Can it integrate with my existing system?
items.answer: Currently Lako works as a standalone system. For custom integrations, contact us — we can build connections tailored to your needs.
